name: PewPew (itch) (Khaled Adas)
description:
Pewpew is a Retro style Arcade shooter where you shoot aliens, Try diffrent weapons, Collect power-up and try to rank up the highest score possible!

are you up for the challenge?

Game modes :

  • Online mode : Share your HIGHSCORES online with others players and try to get to the top!
  • Offline Play : Invite your friends over for a couch party and challenge them who can get the highest KILL COUNT!
  • Target Practice : Practice your aim, Challenge your speed, and improve your accuracy.

Credits :

  • Developer : Khaled173 (me)
  • Cover art : WeirdPotato
